name: I Miss You (WIP)
description:
Note: Screenshots used for inspiration (not owned) 

First Jam and game and it Contains some visual bugs

Game made under 72 hours for The Heart Jam

https://itch.io/jam/heartjam

Theme of Game Jam:

  • Scarcity

Software and Team:

  • Game Engine: GameMaker Studio 2 Desktop
  •  Zukureneno - Programming
  •  Indychan - Art:  Krita & Pyxel Edit 
  • Landon - Music @GameMusicLandon
  • Special thanks to:  kassiebassie and Landon for helping me and HeartBeast for giving those courses :D

Story: 

  • After the destruction of Earth made by the hands of humans; a lone scientist try's to recover earth's former glory.

Gameplay: 

  • Dig out the plants and incubate them inside protective containers and bring them back before they wither away.

Style:

  • Pixel art 
  • Top Down View
  • Griddy, Destroyed

Features:

  • Rescue time
  • Oxygen levels

Controls: 

 WASD/Arrow Keys

  • E/C = Collect
  • Menu: E/C/J/Z  = Accept
  • Enter: For Faster closing of messages
  • R = Restart Game

Wishlist :

  • Story dialogue
  • Interaction with items/backgrounds [For button E/C]
  • Upgrades
  • Monsters
